title: CU-TEMPORAL-002 User LoggedIn from IP outside Spain
search:
`o365_management_activity` Workload=AzureActiveDirectory Operation=UserLoggedIn user!="*pwc*" src_ip!="134.238.10*"
| bucket span=5m _time 
| iplocation src_ip
| where Country!="Spain"
| stats count values(user) as user values(Country) as country values(signature) as signature values(UserAgent) as user_agent values(RequestType) as RequestType  min(_time) as firstTime, max(_time) as lastTime values(SessionId) by _time src_ip
